sql: WITH b as (SELECT st_setsrid(st_geomfromgeojson('{{bounds}}'), 4326) as the_geom) SELECT ST_AsGeoJSON(wdpa.the_geom) as the_geom, wdpa.name, wdpa.desig_eng, wdpa.desig_type FROM wdpa_protected_areas as wdpa, b WHERE ST_Intersects(wdpa.the_geom, b.the_geom) AND wdpa.iucn_cat in ('Ia', 'Ib', 'II', 'III')
